item.title: Blackstone 为 Acuity 提供 6 亿美元私人信用贷款
item.description: 据一位熟悉此事的人士透露，Blackstone Inc. 已向 Permira Holdings LLP 拥有的研究和数据公司 Acuity Knowledge Partners 提供了 6 亿美元的私人信用贷款。【原文：Blackstone Inc. has provided a $600 million private credit loan to Acuity Knowledge Partners, a research and data company owned by Permira Holdings LLP., according to a person familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 匈牙利欧尔班称欧盟对中国电动汽车征收关税将适得其反
item.description: 匈牙利总理维克托-欧尔班（Viktor Orban）抨击欧盟在制定环保目标时没有考虑到欧洲大陆汽车工业的利益。【原文：Hungarian Prime Minister Viktor Orban slammed the European Union for what he said was a failure to take into account the interests of the continent’s car industry in setting environmental goals.】

item.title: 致命的马尔堡病毒为何对非洲的威胁与日俱增？
item.description: 截至 10 月初，马尔堡病毒已在卢旺达造成 12 人死亡，这也是该国首次确诊爆发这种致死率接近 90% 的高致病性疾病。马尔堡病毒与埃博拉病毒同属一个家族，主要在中非和南部非洲偶尔爆发和出现零星病例，直到 2021 年 8 月西非的几内亚确认了一个致命病例。随后几年，它首次在非洲大陆的其他国家出现。【原文：Marburg virus had killed 12 people in Rwanda as of early October, touching off the nation’s first confirmed outbreak of the highly virulent disease that can have a fatality rate of close to 90%. From the same family as the Ebola virus, Marburg caused occasional outbreaks and sporadic cases mostly in Central and Southern Africa until Guinea, in West Africa, confirmed a single, deadly case in August 2021. Then in the following years, it popped up for the first time in other countries on the contin】

item.title: 商业领袖称印尼必须改革才能实现 8%的国内生产总值增长
item.description: 印尼一个颇具影响力的商业协会的领导人表示，印尼要想实现即将上任的总统普拉博沃-苏比安托（Prabowo Subianto）提出的国内生产总值年增长率达到8%的目标，就必须对国有企业进行改革并扩大投资。【原文：Indonesia will need to reform its state-owned enterprises and build up investment if it wants to hit incoming President Prabowo Subianto’s target of 8% annual gross domestic product growth, said the leader of an influential business association.】

item.title: 投资者评估中国涨势消退，欧洲股市出现波动
item.description: 欧洲股市周三开盘时有所波动，因为投资者在评估中国股市涨势不振对与世界第二大经济体关系最密切的行业的影响。【原文：European stocks fluctuated at the open on Wednesday as investors assessed the impact of a faltering rally in Chinese shares on sectors most exposed to the world’s second biggest economy.】

item.title: Equinor称安哥拉抗衰石油政策正在发挥作用
item.description: Equinor ASA称，安哥拉通过更新政策来避免石油产量下降的努力正在产生积极影响。【原文：Equinor ASA said Angola’s efforts to stave off a decline in its oil production by updating policy is having a positive effect.】

item.title: 印度央行立场转变，指数加持延长印度债券涨势
item.description: 印度债券的涨势似乎已无法阻挡，它们已是今年亚洲表现最好的债券。【原文：It looks like there’s no stopping the rally in India’s bonds, already the best performers in Asia this year.】

item.title: FTX 债权人的出现可能为萎靡不振的加密货币市场注入活力
item.description: 加密货币交易所 FTX 的债权人将在未来几个月内收到超过 120 亿美元的法院批准的赔付计划，这使得部分现金有望重新投入到数字资产中。【原文：Crypto exchange FTX’s creditors are set to receive more than $12 billion in coming months in a court-approved payout plan, raising the prospect that some of the cash could be plowed back into digital assets.】

item.title: 印度警告影子银行如不控制风险将被采取行动
item.description: 印度央行警告影子银行建立健全的风险缓解系统，如更全面地评估个人借款人的信用价值，否则央行可能不得不介入并采取监管行动。【原文：India’s central bank warned shadow banks to put in place robust risk mitigating systems like assessing credit worthiness of individual borrowers in a more comprehensive manner, failing which it might have to step in and take regulatory action.】

item.title: 冬季需求迫在眉睫，英国天然气期货价格超越欧洲基准价格
item.description: 英国天然气期货价格已高于欧洲大陆的基准合约，这表明交易商已开始为需求增长做好准备。【原文：UK natural gas futures have become more expensive than benchmark contracts in continental Europe, signaling traders are starting to prepare for a rise in demand.】

item.title: 据说大众银行考虑收购已故创始人家族持有的 LPI 股份
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，大众银行（Public Bank Bhd.）正在考虑收购其已故创始人Teh Hong Piow家族持有的龙柏保险有限公司（Lonpac Insurance Bhd.）的股份。【原文：Public Bank Bhd. is considering buying its late founder Teh Hong Piow’s family stake in the owner of Lonpac Insurance Bhd., people familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: 欧洲央行维勒鲁瓦称下周降息可能性很大，但不会是最后一次
item.description: 欧洲中央银行理事会成员弗朗索瓦-维勒鲁瓦-德-加尔豪（Francois Villeroy de Galhau）表示，欧洲中央银行很可能在下周降低利率，并将在未来的会议上根据应对物价上涨的进展情况再次放宽货币政策。【原文：The European Central Bank will very probably lower interest rates next week and will loosen monetary policy again at future meetings depending on progress combating price rises, Governing Council member Francois Villeroy de Galhau said.】

item.title: 中国医院在红斑狼疮大型试验中看到了细胞疗法的前景
item.description: 中国的医生说，一种国产细胞疗法在患有严重自身免疫性疾病的儿童身上取得了初步成功，这是内地生物技术公司在开发治疗难治疾病的尖端疗法方面赶上西方同行的最新迹象。【原文：Doctors in China said a homegrown cell therapy saw initial success in children with a severe autoimmune disorder, the latest sign that mainland biotech firms are catching up with western peers in developing cutting-edge treatments for hard-to-treat diseases.】

item.title: 渣打银行印度首席执行官达鲁瓦拉将于四月退休
item.description: 根据彭博社看到的一份备忘录，渣打银行（Standard Chartered Plc）印度首席执行官扎林-达鲁瓦拉（Zarin Daruwala）将于 4 月 1 日退休。【原文：Standard Chartered Plc’s chief executive officer for India, Zarin Daruwala, will retire April 1, according to a memo seen by Bloomberg.】

item.title: 富时 100 指数直播：英国股市在经历两个月来最严重下跌后将出现小幅反弹
item.description: 位于伦敦金融城的伦敦证券交易所集团中庭显示股票价格信息。摄影师：克里斯-拉特克利夫/布鲁姆伯格【原文：Stock price information displayed in the London Stock Exchange Group Plc's office atrium in the City of London. Photographer: Chris Ratcliffe/Bloomberg】

item.title: 埃及通胀率连续第二个月加快，补贴削减成为影响因素
item.description: 由于能源成本大幅上涨，埃及通胀率连续第二个月小幅上升，这可能会推迟北非国家自 2020 年以来首次降息的时间。【原文：Egyptian inflation quickened slightly for a second month on a sharp hike in energy costs, potentially pushing back the timing of the North African nation’s first interest-rate cut since 2020.】

item.title: 台积电销售额超预期，显示人工智能芯片需求稳健
item.description: 台湾积体电路制造股份有限公司（Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing Co.【原文：Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing Co. posted a better-than-expected 39% rise in quarterly revenue, assuaging concerns that AI hardware spending is beginning to taper off.】

item.title: 力拓将以 67 亿美元收购钒锂公司
item.description: 力拓集团（Rio Tinto Group）收购钒锂公司（Arcadium Lithium Plc）的全现金交易获得董事会批准，交易价值为 67 亿美元，这将推动这家全球第二大矿业公司成为重要电池材料的主要生产商。【原文：Rio Tinto Group has won board approval to buy Arcadium Lithium Plc in an all-cash deal that values it at $6.7 billion, boosting the world’s second-biggest miner’s bid to become a major producer of the crucial battery material.】

item.title: 因担心儿童安全，土耳其禁止访问 Discord
item.description: 土耳其司法部长耶尔马兹-通克（Yilmaz Tunc）说，在法院对参与虐待儿童的团体使用社交媒体平台 Discord 表示担忧后，土耳其封锁了该平台。【原文：Turkey blocked the social media platform Discord after a court cited concerns over its use by groups involved in child abuse, Justice Minister Yilmaz Tunc said.】

item.title: 开始一天生活所需的五件事欧洲
item.description:
及时了解市场监测情况

Get up to speed with what the markets are monitoring

】

item.title: 阿克塞尔-施普林格支持的 Dyn 将以投资者圈的形式开始融资
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，德国体育流媒体平台 Dyn Media 正计划进行一轮融资，估值可能达到 6000 万欧元（6600 万美元）或更高。【原文：German sports streaming platform Dyn Media is planning a funding round that could value the business at €60 million ($66 million) or more, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: Funding Circle 从首次公开募股失败到反弹 230%，成为英国顶级股票
item.description: 一只在 2018 年首次公开募股后第一年暴跌近 80% 的股票，成为今年英国富时全股指数中表现最好的股票。【原文：A stock that plummeted almost 80% in the first year after its 2018 initial public offering has become this year’s top performer in Britain’s FTSE All-Share Index.】

item.title: 中国需要的不仅仅是这些
item.description:
在经历了多年的不可预测性之后，市场已经失去了耐心。政府部门需要严守信息发布纪律。【原文：

Markets have thin patience after years of uninvestability. Authorities need to get their messaging under discipline.

】

item.title: MBK 称不会筹集 130 亿美元收购韩国锌业
item.description: MBK Partners 表示，在全球最大锌冶炼厂韩国锌业公司股票延期招标即将结束的前几天，它不会提高收购韩国锌业公司控制权的报价。【原文：MBK Partners has said it won’t raise its offer to gain control of Korea Zinc Co., days before an extended tender for shares in the world’s biggest zinc smelter is set to close.】

item.title: 新光股东批准与规模较小的竞争对手合并
item.description: 新光金控与台新金控合并案获得股东批准，从而成为台湾第四大金融集团。【原文：Shin Kong Financial Holding Co. secured shareholder approval for its merger with Taishin Financial Holding Co., creating the fourth-biggest financial conglomerate in Taiwan.】

item.title: 本地股热潮退去，港元融资成本下降
item.description: 香港银行同业拆借成本指数在 13 个交易日中首次下跌，原因是当地股市在中国刺激经济大潮的推动下反弹后回落。【原文：A gauge of interbank borrowing costs in Hong Kong dropped for the first time in 13 sessions as local stocks retreated following a rally fueled by China’s stimulus blitz.】

item.title: 市场为何能摆脱石油冲击之母的影响？
item.description:
石油交易商正以 "这次不同以往 "的态度来应对战争风险。这就是风险。【原文：

Oil traders are taking a “this time is different” approach to war risk. That’s, well, risky. 

】

item.title: 法国多年的 "财政谋杀 "正在追悔莫及
item.description:
投资者因法国政治僵局和预算宽松而回避法国债务。【原文：

Investors are shunning French debt over the country’s political gridlock and budgetary largess. 

】

item.title: 养老基金要求英国制定新的债务规则以刺激绿色投资
item.description: 养老基金正在要求英国政府修改决定如何衡量公共债务的规则，以鼓励对绿色产业进行更多投资。【原文：Pension funds are asking the UK government to revamp rules determining how public debt is measured, to encourage more investment in green industries.】

item.title: 亚马逊影响力基金投资北欧荷兰初创企业 Paebbl
item.description: 亚马逊公司（Amazon.com Inc. ）在一份声明中表示，它加入了一批投资者的行列，使北欧-荷兰初创公司 Paebbl 通过 A 轮融资筹集到了 2500 万美元。【原文：Amazon.com Inc. joined a group of investors enabling Nordic-Dutch startup Paebbl to raise $25 million via a Series A funding round, according to a statement.】
